labels.label: extraction of the raw api data from kafka into a table used-car-colors
UPSERT -- for table used_car_colors_yearcolor_group, if the item (year,color) already exists, update, else insert new value

entry.value: INSERT INTO used_car_colors.used_car_colors_yearcolor_group (year, color, count) VALUES(${year},'${color}',${yc_count}) ON CONFLICT (year, color) DO UPDATE SET count = ${yc_count}
